abstract: Rio Tinto, the global mining company, posted record first-half profit Tuesday, bolstering its effort to fend off a hostile takeover by BHP Billiton.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto, the global mining company, posted record first-half profit Tuesday, bolstering its effort to fend off a hostile takeover by BHP Billiton.

headline.main: Rio Tinto’s Record First-Half Profit Helps in Battle With BHP
